ksef.description: KSeF API Configuration. Environment: 'test', 'demo', or 'prod'. Token loaded from KSEF_TOKEN environment variable or Docker secret 'ksef_token'.

notifications.description: Multi-channel notification system. Enable channels by listing them in 'channels' array. All secrets loaded from environment variables or Docker secrets.

pushover.description: Pushover credentials loaded from PUSHOVER_USER_KEY and PUSHOVER_API_TOKEN (env vars or Docker secrets: pushover_user_key, pushover_api_token)

discord.description: Discord webhook URL loaded from DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL (env var or Docker secret: discord_webhook_url)

slack.description: Slack webhook URL loaded from SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL (env var or Docker secret: slack_webhook_url)

email.description: Email password loaded from EMAIL_PASSWORD (env var or Docker secret: email_password). Configure SMTP settings here.

webhook.description: Webhook token (if needed) loaded from WEBHOOK_TOKEN (env var or Docker secret: webhook_token) into Authorization header

monitoring.description: Monitoring settings. subject_types: Subject1 (sprzeda≈ºowe), Subject2 (zakupowe). date_type: Issue | Invoicing | PermanentStorage. timezone: IANA timezone name (default: Europe/Warsaw)

schedule.description: Schedule configuration. See config.example.json for all scheduling options and examples.

prometheus.description: Prometheus metrics endpoint on /metrics. Set enabled: false to disable.
